title: Bugsplat
body:
So I havent played in a while and just recently updated but Im getting a bugsplat after champ select. I tried deleting the logitech files and the 0.0. files with no luck. I even reinstalled a fresh copy of the game and still getting the same problem. Any ideas on how I can fix this?

Thanks

replies.body: Riot,  I have had bugsplat issues 2 days in a row now, and I have to end up repairing files. This has caused me to lose LP in ranked. Please fix this.

Bugsplats are often caused by driver or hardware issues, so there are a number of steps that can be taken to troubleshoot the cause. Our [Bugsplat & Crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes) guide is a great place to start since we've consolidated the most common fixes there.

Let me know if that guide helped resolve this.
Had to reinstall a second time and be sure to delete all files/folders. Worked after that.
